Plot: When the Davison family comes under attack during their wedding anniversary getaway, the gang of mysterious killers soon learns that one of the victims harbors a secret talent for fighting back.
Title: You're Next
Actors: Sharni Vinson, Nicholas Tucci, Wendy Glenn, AJ Bowen
tomatoConsensus: You're Next's energetic and effective mix of brutal gore and pitch black humor will please horror buffs and beyond.
